title: Computer-Based Safety Education Design: Multimedia-Utilized Instructional Methodology

context.prior_knowledge: Basic computer literacy and foundational safety education theory
context.additional_context: Strengthening competencies in designing safety education linked to language curricula for pre-service teachers.

learning_goals: Design multimedia-based (text, images, audio) safety education materials considering diverse age groups
Enhance the accessibility of computer-based educational content by applying cognitive learning theories
Propose teaching-learning improvement strategies using formative assessment tools implementable in smartphone environments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
